resources.string: Gives an average score of an event type based on its relationship to Rating, Bm Completeness or Bm Bristol.
UPCOMING FEATURE. Shows a percentage for event types that describes how often they have been within a certain score (Rating, Bm Completeness or Bm Bristol) interval
UPCOMING FEATURE. Shows the time periods that the diary has been within a certain score (Rating, Bm Completeness or Bm Bristol) interval.
UPCOMING FEATURE. Gives average score of meal sizes (meal portions) based on their relationships to Rating, Bm Completeness or Bm Bristol.

SCALE	DESCRIPTION
 7.0	Liquid
 6.0	Mushy with ragged edges
 5.0	Soft blobs with clear edges
 4.0	Smooth sausaget
 3.0	Sausage with cracked surface
 2.0	Lumpy Sausage
 1.0	Seperate hard lumps
